title: Microsoft Defender ATP (com.microsoft.wdav)
description: Preference Domain: com.microsoft.wdav, Application: Microsoft Defender ATP Visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/mac-preferences for preference information

allowedThreats.title: Allowed Threats
allowedThreats.description: Specify threats by name that are not blocked by Microsoft Defender ATP for Mac

disallowedThreatActions.title: Disallowed Threat Actions
disallowedThreatActions.description: Restricts the actions that the local user of a device can take when threats are detected. Possible Values: allow (restricts users from allowing threats) & restore (restricts users from restoring threats from the quarantine)

enableRealTimeProtection.title: Enable Real Time Protection
enableRealTimeProtection.description: Specify whether to enable real-time protection, which scans files as they are accessed.

passiveMode.title: Enable Passive Mode
passiveMode.description: Specify whether the antivirus engine runs in passive mode.

exclusionsMergePolicy.title: Exclusions Merge Policy
exclusionsMergePolicy.description: Specify the merge policy for exclusions. This can be a combination of administrator-defined and user-defined exclusions (merge) or only administrator-defined exclusions (admin_only). This setting can be used to restrict local users from defining their own exclusions.

exclusions.title: Exclusions
exclusions.description: Specify entities excluded from being scanned. Exclusions can be specified by full paths, extensions, or file names. More information and examples availiable at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/mac-preferences

threatTypeSettings.title: Threat Type Settings
threatTypeSettings.description: Specify how certain threat types are handled by Microsoft Defender ATP for Mac.

cloudservice.title: CloudService Config
cloudservice.description: Configure the cloud-driven protection features of Microsoft Defender ATP for Mac.

automaticSampleSubmission.title: Automatic Sample Submission
automaticSampleSubmission.description: Determines whether suspicious samples (that are likely to contain threats) are sent to Microsoft. You are prompted if the submitted file is likely to contain personal information.

diagnosticLevel.title: Diagnostic Level
diagnosticLevel.description: Diagnostic data is used to keep Microsoft Defender ATP secure and up-to-date, detect, diagnose and fix problems, and also make product improvements. This setting determines the level of diagnostics sent by Microsoft Defender ATP to Microsoft. Values: Optional (default) & Required

enabled.title: Enable CloudService Config
enabled.description: Specify whether to enable cloud-delivered protection the device or not.

edr.title: Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) preferences
edr.description: Manage the preferences of the Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) component of Microsoft Defender ATP for Mac.

earlyPreview.title: Enable Early Preview
earlyPreview.description: Set up your Mac machine to be an Insider machine to enable preview features.

tags.title: Machine Tags
tags.description: Provide a tag to machines for provisioning into console. (only one tag per machine is supported)

userInterface.title: Show Defender ATP in Menu Bar
userInterface.description: Show or hide Defender ATP in Menu Bar.
